sen.j: 九世 観世 銕之丞（かんぜ てつのじょう、1956年10月23日 -）とは、シテ方観世流能楽師。
sen.e: Tetsunojo KANZE the 9th (October 23, 1956 -) is a Noh actor of the Kanze school of lead actors (shite-kata).
Tetsunojo KANZE the Ninth (October 23, 1956 -) is a Noh actor of the Kanze school of shite-kata (lead actors).
sen.cmt: 余分なスペース消去、the 9th→the Ninth、lead actors (shite-kata)→shite-kata (lead actors)としました。
sen.e: Tetsunojo KANZE the Ninth (October 23, 1956 -) is a Noh actor of the Kanze school of shite-kata (lead actors).
The present head of the Tetsunojo KANZE family

His real name is Akeo KANZE.

sen.j: 観世銕之亟 (8世)（人間国宝）の長男。
sen.e: He is the eldest son of Tetsunojo KANZE the 8th (Living National Treasure).
He is the eldest son of Tetsunojo KANZE the Eighth (Living National Treasure).

sen.j: 伯父観世寿夫、および父に師する。
sen.e: He was apprenticed to his uncle, Hisao KANZE, and his father.

He made his debut at the age of four in 1960.

He played his first starring role in "Iwafune" (The Stone Ship) in 1964.

He performed "Sagi" (The White Heron) in 1971, "Shakkyo" (The Stone Bridge) in 1974, "Okina" (The Old Man) in 1983, and "Dojoji" (Dojo-ji Temple) in 1984.

sen.j: 重要無形文化財総合指定保持者。

sen.j: 妻は京舞井上流五世井上八千代。
sen.e: Yachiyo INOUE, the 5th head of the Inoue school of Kyoto dancing, is his wife.

sen.j: 長女が井上安寿子（観世安寿子）、長男が観世淳夫。
sen.e: Yasuko INOUE (Yasuko KANZE) is his eldest daughter; Atsuo KANZE is his eldest son.

He oversaw the writing of a comic book, "Hana yorimo hana no gotoku" (more flowerlike than any natural flower).

sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更、クォーテーション内の単語の頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: He oversaw the writing of a comic book, 'Hana Yorimo Hana no Gotoku' (more flowerlike than any natural flower).

sen.j: 成田美名子の漫画作品「花よりも花の如く」の監修を行っており、単行本2巻185ページでは、九世銕之丞本人直筆によるカエルのイラスト（「うまくかけねーっ」と書き添えられている）も登場している。
sen.e: He supervised Minako Narita's comic book, "Hana yorimo hana no gotoku," in which he himself made a cartoon drawing of a frog on the page 185 of Vol. 2 with his comment saying, "What a poorly made drawing!"

sen.cmt: Minako Narita→Minako NARITAに修正、シングルクォーテーションに変更、'Hana Yorimo Hana no Gotoku'としました。
